attributes.action: To allow students to use toilets in school whenever they need it
attributes.additional_details: Many children who are in secondary school do not have access to the toilets unless it’s at break or lunch and this can affect people with bladder problems and is unfair since people can’t go to the toilet on command
attributes.background: I want the government to make a law where all students are allowed to have access to the toilets in school throughout the day whenever they need

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which asks for the same action: "Require schools to let children use the toilet at all times in the school day" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731355
